attributes.action: Immediately step in to reduce the cost of fuel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Not only have we seen an increase in fuel costs due to rises in oil prices, but at the same time the government has increased its tax on fuel. This is generating an additional £1.1M per day in revenue. I challenge the government to immediately reduce tax on fuel to counteract the increase in oil prices.
